data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Kayangel to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kayangel, Palau
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Kayangel, Palau know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Kayangel.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 22 believers in Kayangel, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Kayangel
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Kayangel, Kayangel, Palau.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kayangel.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Kayangel, Palau, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, help the 22 believers in Kayangel to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests
